title: In case of plotted layout, the basic FSI of such net area shall be distributed on all plots on pro-rata basis or on certain plots as land owner desires, subject to maximum receiving potential prescribed in these regulations
clause_text: In case of plotted layout, the basic FSI of such net area shall be distributed on all plots on pro-rata basis or on certain plots as land owner desires, subject to maximum receiving potential prescribed in these regulations. However, such entitlement of FSI on certain plots shall be clearly mentioned on the layout plan. In case of plots from already approved layouts, the plot area shall be treated as net plot area.
section: 3.9 NET PLOT AREA AND COMPUTATION OF FSI

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
